changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FORECAST_LOCATION','DATUM') IS NULL ALTER TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FORECAST_LOCATION ADD DATUM NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_DATUM_FORECAST_LOCATION DEFAULT 'none' CONSTRAINT CHK_LIMIT_DATUM_INPUT_VALUES CHECK (DATUM = 'mALD' OR DATUM = 'mAOD' OR DATUM = 'none')

rollback.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FORECAST_LOCATION','DATUM') IS NOT NULL ALTER TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.FORECAST_LOCATION DROP CONSTRAINT CHK_LIMIT_DATUM_INPUT_VALUES, CONSTRAINT DF_DATUM_FORECAST_LOCATION, COLUMN DATUM
